stories.text: I use Firefox, but apparently CNN can circumvent my autoplay blocking. I'd like to kick up some trouble to punish them for trying to circumvent it at all, and hopefully get Firefox to release a workaround for their workaround.
stories.title: Ask HN: Where to report sites that circumvent autoplay blocking?

stories.text: We built Static as an easy way to manage context data in a Data Warehouse - stuff like sales targets that change often and you wish stakeholders could just update themselves. This is a super early release, and we appreciate any and all feedback about how this can be more useful. there's a decent free tier and the link has a HN promo code for free use of the paid tier.
stories.title: Show HN: We built Static, a SaaS tool to manage data warehouse user inputs
